summary: This bill, the "Growing America’s Small Businesses and Manufacturing Act," aims to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. It seeks to permanently extend and clarify the allowance for depreciation, amortization, or depletion when determining the income limitation on business interest deductions.  Additionally, the bill increases limitations on expensing depreciable business assets and adjusts these limits for inflation, with the changes applicable to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
